faq_answer: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase with a valid receipt.

faq_question: How do I track my order?
faq_answer: You can track your order from your account dashboard under 'Orders'.
Orders can be cancelled within 2 hours of placement from the order details page.
Contact our support via email at support@example.com or call 1-800-123-4567.
Yes, we ship internationally. Shipping fees vary by destination.
